name: Steering Not Included
description:
Made for 2018 Bluelight Collective Game Jam, prompt "pick up and play".

Simple arcade-y multiplayer thing; each player presses one key to shoot with their little turret-satellite, which also propels them in the opposite direction. Players need to be the last one standing to win each round, first to X wins wins.

Made in 2 days by Harrison Ellem and Michael Smith (https://github.com/silentcoder99)
